Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Acinetobacter sp. NISL B-4653, Escherichia coli HB1ll, Pseudomonas fluorescens IAM1179;Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC6538P.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.PTM: O-glycosylation is important for the antibacterial activity of lebocin, O-linked glycan structure is a disaccharide (Gal-GalNAc) in case of lebocin 1 and a monosaccharide (GalNAc) in case of lebocin 2.

Literature.Title: A novel antibacterial peptide family isolated from the silkworm, Bombyx mori.
Literature.Author: Hara S, Yamakawa M.

Literature.Title: cDNA cloning and gene expression of lebocin, a novel member of antibacterial peptides from the silkworm, Bombyx mori.
Literature.Author: Chowdhury S, Taniai K, Hara S, Kadono-Okuda K, Kato Y, Yamamoto M, Xu J, Choi SK, Debnath NC, Choi HK, et al.
